# stop(with:completion:)

**Instance Method**

Command Stop

## Declaration

```swift
func stop(with params: MTROvenCavityOperationalStateClusterStopParams?, completion: @escaping (MTROvenCavityOperationalStateClusterOperationalCommandResponseParams?, (any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
func stop(with params: MTROvenCavityOperationalStateClusterStopParams?) async throws -> MTROvenCavityOperationalStateClusterOperationalCommandResponseParams
```

## Discussion

Upon receipt, the device SHALL stop its operation if it is at a position where it is safe to do so and/or permitted.
